lead_paragraph: Energy shares lead modest losses, and investors assessed a report that showed a ramp-up in the construction of new homes. The price of oil fell nearly 4 percent.

headline.print_headline: Signs of Housing Comeback Fail to Rouse Market
headline.main: Signs of Housing Comeback Fail to Rouse Market

snippet: Energy shares lead modest losses, and investors assessed a report that showed a ramp-up in the construction of new homes. The price of oil fell nearly 4 percent.
abstract: Markets sustain modest losses in day of listless trading, as investors respond to continued drop in oil prices and disappointing quarterly report from Walmart.
